name: A Dream of Three
description:
You wake up. You have no sense of who you are, where you are, what is happening.. well, more like what ISN'T happening.. and why you're even there.

~~~~~~

A Dream of Three is a very short game for my ongoing YouTube series named "1 4M N0T WH4T Y0U KN3W". The channel's story follows Mykel, a transman stuck in an endless void nicknamed "Purgatory". He is stuck with some other people, and more people are to come. 

This story is from the perspective of the people yet to be seen.

~~~~~

This is my first game ever made, and was made using Twine. If you enjoy this game, than thank you. If you don't, that's alright too.

~~~~~

https://www.youtube.com/channel/UC4RXoH69EvVMKzdl5TyO-Ow
